history.content:
Hi, US Market Access Center has a great opportunity for university-based startups that I thought might be of interest to some students here!

 

They are working with their partners in South Asia (Startup Bangladesh) to promote an exciting startup contest, open to startups worldwide, with $1 MILLION USD in total prize money. The team is bringing judges from Silicon Valley, to help select the best early-stage startups from universities around the world.

 

Main Website: https://www.big.gov.bd/

Bangabandhu Innovation Grant Details

$1M USD in total prize money

  • $100K USD to main winner

  • $12K USD will be award to top 75 applicants

 

The application process is easy:

  • Startup Details (background, etc. Maximum 250 words.)

  • Target Market (Maximum 100 words)

  • Business Strategy (Maximum 250 words)

  • Your title in the startup and relevant experience

 

Apply here: https://www.big.gov.bd/register

 

Deadline for applications is February 28, 2021.

The contest is open to all startups from Universities around the world.
history.subject: University Startup Grant Opportunity
